name: PAT_CHKT_ORIG_PROV
description: Table contains the information about checking out the original provider and original department in the generic patient database.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CHKOUT_ORG_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: CHKOUT_ORG_DEPT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.
